intro.part1: We welcome our friends to socialize and have a good time with the Ukrainian community in
intro.part3: At the moment, we have an offer for you to take part in such events:

mafiaCard.title: Mafia and Board Games
mafiaCard.body: A meet-and-greet where we will talk, play games (mafia, uno, alias, etc.) and just have a good time

cashflowCard.title: Cashflow

mafia.title: Mafia and Board Games
mafia.part1: - food - as of now - order from any restaurant in Talabat (we have a pro version) or wherever your heart desires ))
mafia.part2: - Beverages - tea, cookies, candies are freely available at ‚ò∫Ô∏è and we also bought coffee, juices, soft drinks, and other drinks - the prices are very affordable - definitely cheaper than in any other place)
mafia.part3: - We also invited a service person to help with drinks, keep the place clean, and ensure a comfortable environment for all guests.
mafia.part4: - In addition, you can bring any food and drinks with you.
mafia.part5: We all understand that any organization of an event means certain expenses that we share with everyone. Accordingly, the organizational fee, according to preliminary calculations, is 50 aed per person
mafia.part6: The meeting point is a cottage in Al Barsha South, street 59, Villa 27. There is enough parking space in the courtyard of the cottage))
